mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user(id, user_name, password, name, age, sex, birthday, created, updated) VALUES(null, #{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{birthday}, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_user SET user_name = #{username}, password = #{password}, name = #{name}, age = #{age}, sex = #{sex}, birthday = #{birthday}, updated = now() WHERE id = #{id}
